content: row with mc work the following chart row 1-8 a total of 2 times and then work row 1-4 one more time 169 sts remember to k3 on either side of the chart for both right and wrong side row break cc1 row 25 rs k3 sm m1l k to next m m1r sm s1wyib sm m1l k to next m m1r sm k3 173 sts row 26 ws knit all stitches slipping the markers as you come to them chart b section 4 simple lace 2 using cc2 repeat the 10 row of the simple lace section and break cc2 193 sts section 5 broken rib use mc row 1 rs k3 sm m1l k to next m m1r sm s1wyib sm m1l knit to next m m1r sm k3 4 sts increased row 2 ws knit all stitches slipping the markers as you come to them row 3 rs repeat row 1 row 4 ws k3 sm p1 k1 p1 to next m sm p1 sm p1 k1 to 1 st before next m p1 sm k3 row 5 rs repeat row 1 row 6 ws k3 sm k1 p1 k1 to next m sm p1 sm k1 p1 to 1 st before next m k1 sm k3 repeat row 3-6 one more time then row 1 and 2 one more time 217 sts section 6 wrapped lace use cc1 this pattern is made over a total of 4 sts and 4 row and it s unusual in that it increases the number of stitches you have on row 2 and then decreases it back to the original count on row 3 the wrapped stitch is made on row 3 and turns 5 sts back to 4 and will be called wrap for simplicity in the row instructions wrap stitch drop the yarn over from the previous row make another yarn over slip the next stitch purlwise with yarn in back knit 3 pass the slipped stitch over the last 3 knit stitches row 1 rs k3 sm m1l k to next m m1r sm s1wyib sm m1l knit to next m m1r sm k3 4 sts increased row 2 ws k3 sm p1 p4 yo till 2 sts before next marker p2 sm p1 sm p2 p4 yo till 1 st before next marker p1 sm k3 row 3 rs k3 sm m1l k1 *wrap st repeat from * till 2 sts before next marker k2 m1r sm s1wyib sm m1l k2 *wrap st repeat from * till 1 st before next marker k1 m1r sm k3 4 sts increased row 4 ws k3 purl to last 3 sts slipping the markers as you come to them k3 row 5 rs as row 1 row 6 ws k3 sm p3 p4 yo till 2 next marker sm p1 sm p4 yo till 3 sts before next marker p3 sm k3 row 7 rs k3 sm m1l k3 *wrap repeat from * to marker m1r sm s1wyib sm
